info: They fly around at high speed, striking with their pointed spears. Even when in trouble, they face opponents bravely.

name: foongus
info: It lures people in with its Poké Ball pattern, then releases poison spores. Why it resembles a Poké Ball is unknown.

name: amoonguss
info: It lures prey close by dancing and waving its arm caps, which resemble Poké Balls, in a swaying motion.

name: frillish
info: With its thin, veil-like arms wrapped around the body of its opponent, it sinks to the ocean floor.

name: jellicent
info: The fate of the ships and crew that wander into Jellicent’s habitat: all sunken, all lost, all vanished.

name: alomomola
info: The special membrane enveloping Alomomola has the ability to heal wounds.

name: joltik
info: Joltik that live in cities have learned a technique for sucking electricity from the outlets in houses.

name: galvantula
info: When attacked, they create an electric barrier by spitting out many electrically charged threads.

name: ferroseed
info: When threatened, it attacks by shooting a barrage of spikes, which gives it a chance to escape by rolling away.

name: ferrothorn
info: It fights by swinging around its three spiky feelers. A hit from these steel spikes can reduce a boulder to rubble.

name: klink
info: The two minigears that mesh together are predetermined. Each will rebound from other minigears without meshing.

name: klang
info: By changing the direction in which it rotates, it communicates its feelings to others. When angry, it rotates faster.

name: klinklang
info: The gear with the red core is rotated at high speed for a rapid energy charge.

name: tynamo
info: While one alone doesn’t have much power, a chain of many Tynamo can be as powerful as lightning.

name: eelektrik
info: They coil around foes and shock them with electricity-generating organs that seem simply to be circular patterns.

name: eelektross
info: They crawl out of the ocean using their arms. They will attack prey on shore and immediately drag it into the ocean.

name: elgyem
info: It uses its strong psychic power to squeeze its opponent’s brain, causing unendurable headaches.

name: beheeyem
info: It can manipulate an opponent’s memory. Apparently, it communicates by flashing its three different-colored fingers.

name: litwick
info: Litwick shines a light that absorbs the life energy of people and Pokémon, which becomes the fuel that it burns.

name: lampent
info: This ominous Pokémon is feared. Through cities it wanders, searching for the spirits of the fallen.

name: chandelure
info: It absorbs a spirit, which it then burns. By waving the flames on its arms, it puts its foes into a hypnotic trance.

name: axew
info: They use their tusks to crush the berries they eat. Repeated regrowth makes their tusks strong and sharp.

name: fraxure
info: Since a broken tusk will not grow back, they diligently sharpen their tusks on river rocks after they’ve been fighting.

name: haxorus
info: They are kind but can be relentless when defending territory. They challenge foes with tusks that can cut steel.

name: cubchoo
info: When it is not feeling well, its mucus gets watery and the power of its Ice-type moves decreases.

name: beartic
info: It can make its breath freeze at will. Very able in the water, it swims around in northern seas and catches prey.

name: cryogonal
info: When its body temperature goes up, it turns into steam and vanishes. When its temperature lowers, it returns to ice.

name: shelmet
info: When attacked, it defends itself by closing the lid of its shell. It can spit a sticky, poisonous liquid.

name: accelgor
info: When its body dries out, it weakens. So, to prevent dehydration, it wraps itself in many layers of thin membrane.

name: stunfisk
info: Its skin is very hard, so it is unhurt even if stepped on by sumo wrestlers. It smiles when transmitting electricity.

name: mienfoo
info: In fights, they dominate with onslaughts of flowing, continuous attacks. With their sharp claws, they cut enemies.

name: mienshao
info: It wields the fur on its arms like a whip. Its arm attacks come with such rapidity that they cannot even be seen.

name: druddigon
info: It warms its body by absorbing sunlight with its wings. When its body temperature falls, it can no longer move.

name: golett
info: The energy that burns inside it enables it to move, but no one has yet been able to identify this energy.

name: golurk
info: It flies across the sky at Mach speeds. Removing the seal on its chest makes its internal energy go out of control.

name: pawniard
info: Blades comprise this Pokémon’s entire body. If battling dulls the blades, it sharpens them on stones by the river.

name: bisharp
info: It leads a group of Pawniard. It battles to become the boss, but will be driven from the group if it loses.

name: bouffalant
info: Their fluffy fur absorbs damage, even if they strike foes with a fierce headbutt.

name: rufflet
info: They crush berries with their talons. They bravely stand up to any opponent, no matter how strong it is.

name: braviary
info: They fight for their friends without any thought about danger to themselves. One can carry a car while flying.

name: vullaby
info: Their wings are too tiny to allow them to fly. They guard their posteriors with bones that were gathered by Mandibuzz.

name: mandibuzz
info: It makes a nest out of bones it finds. It grabs weakened prey in its talons and hauls it to its nest of bones.

name: heatmor
info: It breathes through a hole in its tail while it burns with an internal fire. Durant is its prey.

name: durant
info: They attack in groups, covering themselves in steel armor to protect themselves from Heatmor.

name: deino
info: It tends to bite everything, and it is not a picky eater. Approaching it carelessly is dangerous.

name: zweilous
info: After it has eaten up all the food in its territory, it moves to another area. Its two heads do not get along.

name: hydreigon
info: This brutal Pokémon travels the skies on its six wings. Anything that moves seems like a foe to it, triggering its attack.

name: larvesta
info: This Pokémon was believed to have been born from the sun. When it evolves, its entire body is engulfed in flames.

name: volcarona
info: When volcanic ash darkened the atmosphere, it is said that Volcarona’s fire provided a replacement for the sun.

name: cobalion
info: This legendary Pokémon battled against humans to protect Pokémon. Its personality is calm and composed.

name: terrakion
info: This Pokémon came to the defense of Pokémon that had lost their homes in a war among humans.

name: virizion
info: This Pokémon fought humans in order to protect its friends. Legends about it continue to be passed down.

name: tornadus
info: The lower half of its body is wrapped in a cloud of energy. It zooms through the sky at 200 mph.

name: thundurus
info: Countless charred remains mar the landscape of places through which Thundurus has passed.

name: reshiram
info: This Pokémon appears in legends. It sends flames into the air from its tail, burning up everything around it.

name: zekrom
info: Concealing itself in lightning clouds, it flies throughout the Unova region. It creates electricity in its tail.

name: landorus
info: Lands visited by Landorus grant such bountiful crops that it has been hailed as “The Guardian of the Fields.”

name: kyurem
info: It generates a powerful, freezing energy inside itself, but its body became frozen when the energy leaked out.

name: keldeo
info: By blasting water from its hooves, it can glide across water. It excels at using leg moves while battling.

name: meloetta
info: Its melodies are sung with a special vocalization method that can control the feelings of those who hear it.

name: genesect
info: Over 300 million years ago, it was feared as the strongest of hunters. It has been modified by Team Plasma.

name: chespin
info: The quills on its head are usually soft. When it flexes them, the points become so hard and sharp that they can pierce rock.

name: quilladin
info: It relies on its sturdy shell to deflect predators’ attacks. It counterattacks with its sharp quills.

name: chesnaught
info: Its Tackle is forceful enough to flip a 50-ton tank. It shields its allies from danger with its own body.

name: fennekin
info: Eating a twig fills it with energy, and its roomy ears give vent to air hotter than 390 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: braixen
info: It has a twig stuck in its tail. With friction from its tail fur, it sets the twig on fire and launches into battle.

name: delphox
info: It gazes into the flame at the tip of its branch to achieve a focused state, which allows it to see into the future.

name: froakie
info: It secretes flexible bubbles from its chest and back. The bubbles reduce the damage it would otherwise take when attacked.

name: frogadier
info: It can throw bubble-covered pebbles with precise control, hitting empty cans up to a hundred feet away.

name: greninja
info: It creates throwing stars out of compressed water. When it spins them and throws them at high speed, these stars can split metal in two.

name: bunnelby
info: They use their large ears to dig burrows. They will dig the whole night through.

name: diggersby
info: With their powerful ears, they can heft boulders of a ton or more with ease. They can be a big help at construction sites.

name: fletchling
info: These friendly Pokémon send signals to one another with beautiful chirps and tail-feather movements.

name: fletchinder
info: From its beak, it expels embers that set the tall grass on fire. Then it pounces on the bewildered prey that pop out of the grass.

name: talonflame
info: In the fever of an exciting battle, it showers embers from the gaps between its feathers and takes to the air.

name: scatterbug
info: When under attack from bird Pokémon, it spews a poisonous black powder that causes paralysis on contact.

name: spewpa
info: It lives hidden within thicket shadows. When predators attack, it quickly bristles the fur covering its body in an effort to threaten them.

name: vivillon
info: Vivillon with many different patterns are found all over the world. These patterns are affected by the climate of their habitat.

name: litleo
info: The stronger the opponent it faces, the more heat surges from its mane and the more power flows through its body.

name: pyroar
info: The male with the largest mane of fire is the leader of the pride.

name: flabebe
info: It draws out and controls the hidden power of flowers. The flower Flabébé holds is most likely part of its body.

name: floette
info: It flutters around fields of flowers and cares for flowers that are starting to wilt. It draws out the hidden power of flowers to battle.

name: florges
info: It claims exquisite flower gardens as its territory, and it obtains power from basking in the energy emitted by flowering plants.

name: skiddo
info: Thought to be one of the first Pokémon to live in harmony with humans, it has a placid disposition.

name: gogoat
info: It can tell how its Trainer is feeling by subtle shifts in the grip on its horns. This empathic sense lets them run as if one being.

name: pancham
info: It does its best to be taken seriously by its enemies, but its glare is not sufficiently intimidating. Chewing on a leaf is its trademark.

name: pangoro
info: Although it possesses a violent temperament, it won’t put up with bullying. It uses the leaf in its mouth to sense the movements of its enemies.

name: furfrou
info: Trimming its fluffy fur not only makes it more elegant but also increases the swiftness of its movements.

name: espurr
info: The organ that emits its intense psychic power is sheltered by its ears to keep power from leaking out.

name: meowstic
info: When in danger, it raises its ears and releases enough psychic power to grind a 10-ton truck into dust.

name: honedge
info: Apparently this Pokémon is born when a departed spirit inhabits a sword. It attaches itself to people and drinks their life force.

name: doublade
info: When Honedge evolves, it divides into two swords, which cooperate via telepathy to coordinate attacks and slash their enemies to ribbons.

name: aegislash
info: Generations of kings were attended by these Pokémon, which used their spectral power to manipulate and control people and Pokémon.

name: spritzee
info: It emits a scent that enraptures those who smell it. This fragrance changes depending on what it has eaten.

name: aromatisse
info: It devises various scents, pleasant and unpleasant, and emits scents that its enemies dislike in order to gain an edge in battle.

name: swirlix
info: To entangle its opponents in battle, it extrudes white threads as sweet and sticky as cotton candy.

name: slurpuff
info: It can distinguish the faintest of scents. It puts its sensitive sense of smell to use by helping pastry chefs in their work.

name: inkay
info: Opponents who stare at the flashing of the light-emitting spots on its body become dazed and lose their will to fight.

name: malamar
info: It wields the most compelling hypnotic powers of any Pokémon, and it forces others to do whatever it wants.

name: binacle
info: Two Binacle live together on one rock. When they fight, one of them will move to a different rock.

name: barbaracle
info: When they evolve, two Binacle multiply into seven. They fight with the power of seven Binacle.

name: skrelp
info: Camouflaged as rotten kelp, they spray liquid poison on prey that approaches unawares and then finish it off.

name: dragalge
info: Their poison is strong enough to eat through the hull of a tanker, and they spit it indiscriminately at anything that enters their territory.

name: clauncher
info: They knock down flying prey by firing compressed water from their massive claws like shooting a pistol.

name: clawitzer
info: Their enormous claws launch cannonballs of water powerful enough to pierce tanker hulls.

name: helioptile
info: They make their home in deserts. They can generate their energy from basking in the sun, so eating food is not a requirement.

name: heliolisk
info: They flare their frills and generate energy. A single Heliolisk can generate sufficient electricity to power a skyscraper.

name: tyrunt
info: This Pokémon was restored from a fossil. If something happens that it doesn’t like, it throws a tantrum and runs wild.

name: tyrantrum
info: Thanks to its gargantuan jaws, which could shred thick metal plates as if they were paper, it was invincible in the ancient world it once inhabited.

name: amaura
info: This ancient Pokémon was restored from part of its body that had been frozen in ice for over 100 million years.

name: aurorus
info: The diamond-shaped crystals on its body expel air as cold as -240 degrees Fahrenheit, surrounding its enemies and encasing them in ice.

name: sylveon
info: It sends a soothing aura from its ribbonlike feelers to calm fights.

name: hawlucha
info: Although its body is small, its proficient fighting skills enable it to keep up with big bruisers like Machamp and Hariyama.

name: dedenne
info: Its whiskers serve as antennas. By sending and receiving electrical waves, it can communicate with others over vast distances.

name: carbink
info: Born from the temperatures and pressures deep underground, it fires beams from the stone in its head.

name: goomy
info: The weakest Dragon-type Pokémon, it lives in damp, shady places, so its body doesn’t dry out.

name: sliggoo
info: It drives away opponents by excreting a sticky liquid that can dissolve anything. Its eyes devolved, so it can’t see anything.

name: goodra
info: This very friendly Dragon-type Pokémon will hug its beloved Trainer, leaving that Trainer covered in sticky slime.

name: klefki
info: These key collectors threaten any attackers by fiercely jingling their keys at them.

name: phantump
info: These Pokémon are created when spirits possess rotten tree stumps. They prefer to live in abandoned forests.

name: trevenant
info: It can control trees at will. It will trap people who harm the forest, so they can never leave.

name: pumpkaboo
info: The pumpkin body is inhabited by a spirit trapped in this world. As the sun sets, it becomes restless and active.

name: gourgeist
info: Singing in eerie voices, they wander town streets on the night of the new moon. Anyone who hears their song is cursed.

name: bergmite
info: It blocks opponents’ attacks with the ice that shields its body. It uses cold air to repair any cracks with new ice.

name: avalugg
info: Its ice-covered body is as hard as steel. Its cumbersome frame crushes anything that stands in its way.

name: noibat
info: They live in pitch-black caves. Their enormous ears can emit ultrasonic waves of 200,000 hertz.

name: noivern
info: They fly around on moonless nights and attack careless prey. Nothing can beat them in a battle in the dark.

name: xerneas
info: Legends say it can share eternal life. It slept for a thousand years in the form of a tree before its revival.

name: yveltal
info: When this legendary Pokémon’s wings and tail feathers spread wide and glow red, it absorbs the life force of living creatures.

name: zygarde
info: When the Kalos region’s ecosystem falls into disarray, it appears and reveals its secret power.

name: diancie
info: A sudden transformation of Carbink, its pink, glimmering body is said to be the loveliest sight in the whole world.

name: hoopa
info: This troublemaker sends anything and everything to faraway places using its loop, which can warp space.

name: volcanion
info: It lets out billows of steam and disappears into the dense fog. It’s said to live in mountains where humans do not tread.

name: rowlet
info: This wary Pokémon uses photosynthesis to store up energy during the day, while becoming active at night.

name: dartrix
info: A bit of a dandy, it spends its free time preening its wings. Its preoccupation with any dirt on its plumage can leave it unable to battle.

name: decidueye
info: It fires arrow quills from its wings with such precision, they can pierce a pebble at distances over a hundred yards.

name: litten
info: While grooming itself, it builds up fur inside its stomach. It sets the fur alight and spews fiery attacks, which change based on how it coughs.

name: torracat
info: At its throat, it bears a bell of fire. The bell rings brightly whenever this Pokémon spits fire.

name: incineroar
info: This Pokémon has a violent, selfish disposition. If it’s not in the mood to listen, it will ignore its Trainer’s orders with complete nonchalance.

name: popplio
info: This Pokémon snorts body fluids from its nose, blowing balloons to smash into its foes. It’s famous for being a hard worker.

name: brionne
info: A skillful dancer, it creates a sequence of water balloons as it dances, and briskly bombards its enemies.

name: primarina
info: It controls its water balloons with song. The melody is learned from others of its kind and is passed down from one generation to the next.

name: pikipek
info: It can peck at a rate of 16 times a second to drill holes in trees. It uses the holes for food storage and for nesting.

name: trumbeak
info: It eats berries and stores their seeds in its beak. When it encounters enemies or prey, it fires off all the seeds in a burst.

name: toucannon
info: When it battles, its beak heats up. The temperature can easily exceed 212 degrees Fahrenheit, causing severe burns when it hits.

name: yungoos
info: With its sharp fangs, it will bite anything. It did not originally live in Alola but was imported from another region.

name: gumshoos
info: When it finds a trace of its prey, it patiently stakes out the location...but it’s always snoozing by nightfall.

name: grubbin
info: Its strong jaw enables it to scrape trees and slurp out the sap. It normally lives underground.

name: charjabug
info: Its body is capable of storing electricity. On camping trips, people are grateful to have one around.

name: vikavolt
info: It zips around, on sharp lookout for an opening. It concentrates electrical energy within its large jaws and uses it to zap its enemies.

name: crabrawler
info: While guarding its weak points with its pincers, it looks for an opening and unleashes punches. When it loses, it foams at the mouth and faints.

name: crabominable
info: It aimed for the top but got lost and ended up on a snowy mountain. Being forced to endure the cold, this Pokémon evolved and grew fur.

name: oricorio
info: It beats its wings together to create fire. As it moves in the steps of its beautiful dance, it bathes opponents in intense flames.

name: cutiefly
info: It feeds on the nectar and pollen of flowers. Because it’s able to sense auras, it can identify which flowers are about to bloom.

name: ribombee
info: It rolls up pollen into puffs. It makes many different varieties, some used as food and others used in battle.

name: rockruff
info: It’s considered to be a good Pokémon for beginners because of its friendliness, but its disposition grows rougher as it grows up.

name: lycanroc
info: Its quick movements confuse its enemies. Well equipped with claws and fangs, it also uses the sharp rocks in its mane as weapons.

name: wishiwashi
info: When it’s in trouble, its eyes moisten and begin to shine. The shining light attracts its comrades, and they stand together against their enemies.

name: mareanie
info: It plunges the poison spike on its head into its prey. When the prey has weakened, Mareanie deals the finishing blow with its 10 tentacles.

name: toxapex
info: Toxapex crawls along the ocean floor on its 12 legs. It leaves a trail of Corsola bits scattered in its wake.

name: mudbray
info: The mud stuck to Mudbray’s hooves enhances its grip and its powerful running gait.

name: mudsdale
info: It spits a mud that provides resistance to both wind and rain, so the walls of old houses were often coated with it.

name: dewpider
info: It crawls onto the land in search of food. Its water bubble allows it to breathe and protects its soft head.

name: araquanid
info: It delivers headbutts with the water bubble on its head. Small Pokémon get sucked into the bubble, where they drown.

name: fomantis
info: During the day, it sleeps and soaks up light. When night falls, it walks around looking for a safer place to sleep.

name: lurantis
info: It requires a lot of effort to maintain Lurantis’s vivid coloring, but some collectors enjoy this work and treat it as their hobby.

name: morelull
info: It scatters spores that flicker and glow. Anyone seeing these lights falls into a deep slumber.

name: shiinotic
info: Forests where Shiinotic live are treacherous to enter at night. People confused by its strange lights can never find their way home again.

name: salandit
info: It burns its bodily fluids to create a poisonous gas. When its enemies become disoriented from inhaling the gas, it attacks them.

name: salazzle
info: For some reason, only females have been found. It creates a reverse harem of male Salandit that it lives with.

name: stufful
info: Despite its adorable appearance, when it gets angry and flails about, its arms and legs could knock a pro wrestler sprawling.

name: bewear
info: This immensely dangerous Pokémon possesses overwhelming physical strength. Its habitat is generally off-limits.

name: bounsweet
info: A delectable aroma pours from its body. They are often swallowed whole by Toucannon lured by that wafting deliciousness.

name: steenee
info: The sepals on its head developed to protect its body. These are quite hard, so even if pecked by bird Pokémon, this Pokémon is totally fine.

name: tsareena
info: Its long, striking legs aren’t just for show but to be used to kick with skill. In victory, it shows off by kicking the defeated, laughing boisterously.

name: comfey
info: It attaches flowers to its highly nutritious vine. This revitalizes the flowers, and they give off an aromatic scent.

name: oranguru
info: Known for its extreme intelligence, this Pokémon will look down on inexperienced Trainers, so it’s best suited to veteran Trainers.

name: passimian
info: They form groups of roughly 20 individuals. Their mutual bond is remarkable—they will never let down a comrade.

name: wimpod
info: This Pokémon is a coward. As it desperately dashes off, the flailing of its many legs leaves a sparkling clean path in its wake.

name: golisopod
info: With a flashing slash of its giant sharp claws, it cleaves seawater—or even air—right in two.

name: sandygast
info: Born from a sand mound playfully built by a child, this Pokémon embodies the grudges of the departed.

name: palossand
info: Possessed people controlled by this Pokémon transformed its sand mound into a castle. As it evolved, its power to curse grew ever stronger.

name: pyukumuku
info: It’s covered in a slime that keeps its skin moist, allowing it to stay on land for days without drying up.

name: type-null
info: The heavy control mask it wears suppresses its intrinsic capabilities. This Pokémon has some hidden special power.

name: silvally
info: Its trust in its partner is what awakens it. This Pokémon is capable of changing its type, a flexibility that is well displayed in battle.

name: minior
info: Originally making its home in the ozone layer, it hurtles to the ground when the shell enclosing its body grows too heavy.

name: komala
info: It is born asleep, and it dies asleep. All its movements are apparently no more than the results of it tossing and turning in its dreams.

name: turtonator
info: The shell on its back is chemically unstable and explodes violently if struck. The hole in its stomach is its weak point.

name: togedemaru
info: The spiny fur on its back is normally at rest. When this Pokémon becomes agitated, its fur stands on end and stabs into its attackers.

name: mimikyu
info: Its actual appearance is unknown. A scholar who saw what was under its rag was overwhelmed by terror and died from the shock.

name: bruxish
info: When it unleashes its psychic power from the protuberance on its head, the grating sound of grinding teeth echoes through the area.

name: drampa
info: It has a compassionate personality, but if it is angered, it completely destroys its surroundings with its intense breath.

name: dhelmise
info: Swinging its massive anchor, it can KO Wailord in a single blow. What appears to be green seaweed is actually its body.

name: jangmo-o
info: It expresses its feelings by smacking its scales. Metallic sounds echo through the tall mountains where Jangmo-o lives.

name: hakamo-o
info: It leaps at its prey with a courageous shout. Its scaly punches tear its opponents to shreds.

name: kommo-o
info: When it spots enemies, it threatens them by jingling the scales on its tail. Weak opponents will crack and flee in panic.

name: tapu-koko
info: This guardian deity of Melemele is brimming with curiosity. It summons thunderclouds and stores their lightning inside its body.

name: tapu-lele
info: This guardian deity of Akala is guilelessly cruel. The fragrant aroma of flowers is the source of its energy.

name: tapu-bulu
info: It pulls large trees up by the roots and swings them around. It causes vegetation to grow, and then it absorbs energy from the growth.

name: tapu-fini
info: The dense fog it creates brings the downfall and destruction of its confused enemies. Ocean currents are the source of its energy.

name: cosmog
info: Its body is gaseous and frail. It slowly grows as it collects dust from the atmosphere.

name: cosmoem
info: Motionless as if dead, its body is faintly warm to the touch. In the distant past, it was called the cocoon of the stars.

name: solgaleo
info: It is said to live in another world. The intense light it radiates from the surface of its body can make the darkest of nights light up like midday.

name: lunala
info: It is said to be a female evolution of Cosmog. When its third eye activates, away it flies to another world.

name: nihilego
info: One of several mysterious Ultra Beasts. People on the street report observing those infested by it suddenly becoming violent.

name: buzzwole
info: This Ultra Beast appeared from another world. It shows off its body, but whether that display is a boast or a threat remains unclear.

name: pheromosa
info: One of the dangerous Ultra Beasts, it has been spotted running across the land at terrific speeds.

name: xurkitree
info: One of the mysterious life-forms known as Ultra Beasts. Astonishing electric shocks emanate from its entire body, according to witnesses.

name: celesteela
info: It appeared from the Ultra Wormhole. Witnesses observed it flying across the sky at high speed.

name: kartana
info: This Ultra Beast came from the Ultra Wormhole. It seems not to attack enemies on its own, but its sharp body is a dangerous weapon in itself.

name: guzzlord
info: It has gobbled mountains and swallowed whole buildings, according to reports. It’s one of the Ultra Beasts.

name: necrozma
info: Reminiscent of the Ultra Beasts, this life-form, apparently asleep underground, is thought to have come from another world in ancient times.

name: magearna
info: This artificial Pokémon, constructed more than 500 years ago, can understand human speech but cannot itself speak.

name: marshadow
info: Able to conceal itself in shadows, it never appears before humans, so its very existence was the stuff of myth.

name: poipole
info: This Ultra Beast is well enough liked to be chosen as a first partner in its own world.

name: naganadel
info: It stores hundreds of liters of poisonous liquid inside its body. It is one of the organisms known as UBs.

name: stakataka
info: It appeared from an Ultra Wormhole. Each one appears to be made up of many life-forms stacked one on top of each other.

name: blacephalon
info: It slithers toward people. Then, without warning, it triggers the explosion of its own head. It’s apparently one kind of Ultra Beast.

name: zeraora
info: It electrifies its claws and tears its opponents apart with them. Even if they dodge its attack, they’ll be electrocuted by the flying sparks.

name: meltan
info: It melts particles of iron and other metals found in the subsoil, so it can absorb them into its body of molten steel.

name: melmetal
info: Revered long ago for its capacity to create iron from nothing, for some reason it has come back to life after 3,000 years.

name: grookey
info: When it uses its special stick to strike up a beat, the sound waves produced carry revitalizing energy to the plants and flowers in the area.

name: thwackey
info: The faster a Thwackey can beat out a rhythm with its two sticks, the more respect it wins from its peers.

name: rillaboom
info: By drumming, it taps into the power of its special tree stump. The roots of the stump follow its direction in battle.

name: scorbunny
info: A warm-up of running around gets fire energy coursing through this Pokémon’s body. Once that happens, it’s ready to fight at full power.

name: raboot
info: Its thick and fluffy fur protects it from the cold and enables it to use hotter fire moves.

name: cinderace
info: It juggles a pebble with its feet, turning it into a burning soccer ball. Its shots strike opponents hard and leave them scorched.

name: sobble
info: When scared, this Pokémon cries. Its tears pack the chemical punch of 100 onions, and attackers won’t be able to resist weeping.

name: drizzile
info: A clever combatant, this Pokémon battles using water balloons created with moisture secreted from its palms.

name: inteleon
info: It has many hidden capabilities, such as fingertips that can shoot water and a membrane on its back that it can use to glide through the air.

name: skwovet
info: Found throughout the Galar region, this Pokémon becomes uneasy if its cheeks are ever completely empty of berries.

name: greedent
info: It stashes berries in its tail—so many berries that they fall out constantly. But this Pokémon is a bit slow-witted, so it doesn’t notice the loss.

name: rookidee
info: It will bravely challenge any opponent, no matter how powerful. This Pokémon benefits from every battle—even a defeat increases its strength a bit.

name: corvisquire
info: Smart enough to use tools in battle, these Pokémon have been seen picking up rocks and flinging them or using ropes to wrap up enemies.

name: corviknight
info: This Pokémon reigns supreme in the skies of the Galar region. The black luster of its steel body could drive terror into the heart of any foe.

name: blipbug
info: A constant collector of information, this Pokémon is very smart. Very strong is what it isn’t.

name: dottler
info: It barely moves, but it’s still alive. Hiding in its shell without food or water seems to have awakened its psychic powers.

name: orbeetle
info: It’s famous for its high level of intelligence, and the large size of its brain is proof that it also possesses immense psychic power.

name: nickit
info: Aided by the soft pads on its feet, it silently raids the food stores of other Pokémon. It survives off its ill-gotten gains.

name: thievul
info: It secretly marks potential targets with a scent. By following the scent, it stalks its targets and steals from them when they least expect it.

name: gossifleur
info: It anchors itself in the ground with its single leg, then basks in the sun. After absorbing enough sunlight, its petals spread as it blooms brilliantly.

name: eldegoss
info: The seeds attached to its cotton fluff are full of nutrients. It spreads them on the wind so that plants and other Pokémon can benefit from them.

name: wooloo
info: Its curly fleece is such an effective cushion that this Pokémon could fall off a cliff and stand right back up at the bottom, unharmed.

name: dubwool
info: Weave a carpet from its springy wool, and you end up with something closer to a trampoline. You’ll start to bounce the moment you set foot on it.

name: chewtle
info: Apparently the itch of its teething impels it to snap its jaws at anything in front of it.

name: drednaw
info: With jaws that can shear through steel rods, this highly aggressive Pokémon chomps down on its unfortunate prey.

name: yamper
info: This Pokémon is very popular as a herding dog in the Galar region. As it runs, it generates electricity from the base of its tail.

name: boltund
info: This Pokémon generates electricity and channels it into its legs to keep them going strong. Boltund can run nonstop for three full days.

name: rolycoly
info: Most of its body has the same composition as coal. Fittingly, this Pokémon was first discovered in coal mines about 400 years ago.

name: carkol
info: It forms coal inside its body. Coal dropped by this Pokémon once helped fuel the lives of people in the Galar region.

name: coalossal
info: It’s usually peaceful, but the vandalism of mines enrages it. Offenders will be incinerated with flames that reach 2,700 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: applin
info: It spends its entire life inside an apple. It hides from its natural enemies, bird Pokémon, by pretending it’s just an apple and nothing more.

name: flapple
info: It ate a sour apple, and that induced its evolution. In its cheeks, it stores an acid capable of causing chemical burns.

name: appletun
info: Eating a sweet apple caused its evolution. A nectarous scent wafts from its body, luring in the bug Pokémon it preys on.

name: silicobra
info: As it digs, it swallows sand and stores it in its neck pouch. The pouch can hold more than 17 pounds of sand.

name: sandaconda
info: When it contracts its body, over 220 pounds of sand sprays from its nose. If it ever runs out of sand, it becomes disheartened.

name: cramorant
info: It’s so strong that it can knock out some opponents in a single hit, but it also may forget what it’s battling midfight.

name: arrokuda
info: If it sees any movement around it, this Pokémon charges for it straightaway, leading with its sharply pointed jaw. It’s very proud of that jaw.

name: barraskewda
info: This Pokémon has a jaw that’s as sharp as a spear and as strong as steel. Apparently Barraskewda’s flesh is surprisingly tasty, too.

name: toxel
info: It stores poison in an internal poison sac and secretes that poison through its skin. If you touch this Pokémon, a tingling sensation follows.

name: toxtricity
info: When this Pokémon sounds as if it’s strumming a guitar, it’s actually clawing at the protrusions on its chest to generate electricity.

name: sizzlipede
info: It stores flammable gas in its body and uses it to generate heat. The yellow sections on its belly get particularly hot.

name: centiskorch
info: When it heats up, its body temperature reaches about 1,500 degrees Fahrenheit. It lashes its body like a whip and launches itself at enemies.

name: clobbopus
info: It’s very curious, but its means of investigating things is to try to punch them with its tentacles. The search for food is what brings it onto land.

name: grapploct
info: A body made up of nothing but muscle makes the grappling moves this Pokémon performs with its tentacles tremendously powerful.

name: sinistea
info: This Pokémon is said to have been born when a lonely spirit possessed a cold, leftover cup of tea.

name: polteageist
info: This species lives in antique teapots. Most pots are forgeries, but on rare occasions, an authentic work is found.

name: hatenna
info: Via the protrusion on its head, it senses other creatures’ emotions. If you don’t have a calm disposition, it will never warm up to you.

name: hattrem
info: No matter who you are, if you bring strong emotions near this Pokémon, it will silence you violently.

name: hatterene
info: It emits psychic power strong enough to cause headaches as a deterrent to the approach of others.

name: impidimp
info: Through its nose, it sucks in the emanations produced by people and Pokémon when they feel annoyed. It thrives off this negative energy.

name: morgrem
info: When it gets down on all fours as if to beg for forgiveness, it’s trying to lure opponents in so that it can stab them with its spear-like hair.

name: grimmsnarl
info: With the hair wrapped around its body helping to enhance its muscles, this Pokémon can overwhelm even Machamp.

name: obstagoon
info: Its voice is staggering in volume. Obstagoon has a tendency to take on a threatening posture and shout—this move is known as Obstruct.

name: perrserker
info: What appears to be an iron helmet is actually hardened hair. This Pokémon lives for the thrill of battle.

name: cursola
info: Its shell is overflowing with its heightened otherworldly energy. The ectoplasm serves as protection for this Pokémon’s core spirit.

name: sirfetchd
info: Only Farfetch’d that have survived many battles can attain this evolution. When this Pokémon’s leek withers, it will retire from combat.

name: mr-rime
info: It’s highly skilled at tap-dancing. It waves its cane of ice in time with its graceful movements.

name: runerigus
info: A powerful curse was woven into an ancient painting. After absorbing the spirit of a Yamask, the painting began to move.

name: milcery
info: This Pokémon was born from sweet-smelling particles in the air. Its body is made of cream.

name: alcremie
info: When it trusts a Trainer, it will treat them to berries it’s decorated with cream.

name: falinks
info: Five of them are troopers, and one is the brass. The brass’s orders are absolute.

name: pincurchin
info: It feeds on seaweed, using its teeth to scrape it off rocks. Electric current flows from the tips of its spines.

name: snom
info: It spits out thread imbued with a frigid sort of energy and uses it to tie its body to branches, disguising itself as an icicle while it sleeps.

name: frosmoth
info: Icy scales fall from its wings like snow as it flies over fields and mountains. The temperature of its wings is less than −290 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: stonjourner
info: It stands in grasslands, watching the sun’s descent from zenith to horizon. This Pokémon has a talent for delivering dynamic kicks.

name: eiscue
info: It drifted in on the flow of ocean waters from a frigid place. It keeps its head iced constantly to make sure it stays nice and cold.

name: indeedee
info: It uses the horns on its head to sense the emotions of others. Males will act as valets for those they serve, looking after their every need.

name: morpeko
info: As it eats the seeds stored up in its pocket-like pouches, this Pokémon is not just satisfying its constant hunger. It’s also generating electricity.

name: cufant
info: It digs up the ground with its trunk. It’s also very strong, being able to carry loads of over five tons without any problem at all.

name: copperajah
info: They came over from another region long ago and worked together with humans. Their green skin is resistant to water.

name: dracozolt
info: In ancient times, it was unbeatable thanks to its powerful lower body, but it went extinct anyway after it depleted all its plant-based food sources.

name: arctozolt
info: The shaking of its freezing upper half is what generates its electricity. It has a hard time walking around.

name: dracovish
info: Powerful legs and jaws made it the apex predator of its time. Its own overhunting of its prey was what drove it to extinction.

name: arctovish
info: Though it’s able to capture prey by freezing its surroundings, it has trouble eating the prey afterward because its mouth is on top of its head.

name: duraludon
info: Its body resembles polished metal, and it’s both lightweight and strong. The only drawback is that it rusts easily.

name: dreepy
info: After being reborn as a ghost Pokémon, Dreepy wanders the areas it used to inhabit back when it was alive in prehistoric seas.

name: drakloak
info: It’s capable of flying faster than 120 mph. It battles alongside Dreepy and dotes on them until they successfully evolve.

name: dragapult
info: When it isn’t battling, it keeps Dreepy in the holes on its horns. Once a fight starts, it launches the Dreepy like supersonic missiles.

name: zacian
info: Known as a legendary hero, this Pokémon absorbs metal particles, transforming them into a weapon it uses to battle.

name: zamazenta
info: In times past, it worked together with a king of the people to save the Galar region. It absorbs metal that it then uses in battle.

name: eternatus
info: The core on its chest absorbs energy emanating from the lands of the Galar region. This energy is what allows Eternatus to stay active.

name: kubfu
info: Kubfu trains hard to perfect its moves. The moves it masters will determine which form it takes when it evolves.

name: urshifu
info: This form of Urshifu is a strong believer in the one-hit KO. Its strategy is to leap in close to foes and land a devastating blow with a hardened fist.

name: zarude
info: Within dense forests, this Pokémon lives in a pack with others of its kind. It’s incredibly aggressive, and the other Pokémon of the forest fear it.

name: regieleki
info: This Pokémon is a cluster of electrical energy. It’s said that removing the rings on Regieleki’s body will unleash the Pokémon’s latent power.

name: regidrago
info: An academic theory proposes that Regidrago’s arms were once the head of an ancient dragon Pokémon. The theory remains unproven.

name: glastrier
info: Glastrier emits intense cold from its hooves. It’s also a belligerent Pokémon—anything it wants, it takes by force.

name: spectrier
info: It probes its surroundings with all its senses save one—it doesn’t use its sense of sight. Spectrier’s kicks are said to separate soul from body.

name: calyrex
info: Calyrex is a merciful Pokémon, capable of providing healing and blessings. It reigned over the Galar region in times of yore.

name: wyrdeer
info: The black orbs shine with an uncanny light when the Pokémon is erecting invisible barriers. The fur shed from its beard retains heat well and is a highly useful material for winter clothing.

name: kleavor
info: A violent creature that fells towering trees with its crude axes and shields itself with hard stone. If one should chance upon this Pokémon in the wilds, one's only recourse is to flee.

name: ursaluna
info: I believe it was Hisui's swampy terrain that gave Ursaluna its burly physique and newfound capacity to manipulate peat at will.

name: basculegion
info: Clads itself in the souls of comrades that perished before fulfilling their goals of journeying upstream. No other species throughout all Hisui's rivers is Basculegion's equal.

name: sneasler
info: Because of Sneasler's virulent poison and daunting physical prowess, no other species could hope to best it on the frozen highlands. Preferring solitude, this species does not form packs.

name: overqwil
info: Its lancelike spikes and savage temperament have earned it the nickname ”sea fiend.” It slurps up poison to nourish itself.

name: enamorus
info: When it flies to this land from across the sea, the bitter winter comes to an end. According to legend, this Pokémon's love gives rise to the budding of fresh life across Hisui.

name: sprigatito
info: Its fluffy fur is similar in composition to plants. This Pokémon frequently washes its face to keep it from drying out.

name: floragato
info: Floragato deftly wields the vine hidden beneath its long fur, slamming the hard flower bud against its opponents.

name: meowscarada
info: This Pokémon uses the reflective fur lining its cape to camouflage the stem of its flower, creating the illusion that the flower is floating.

name: fuecoco
info: It lies on warm rocks and uses the heat absorbed by its square-shaped scales to create fire energy.

name: crocalor
info: The combination of Crocalor’s fire energy and overflowing vitality has caused an egg-shaped fireball to appear on the Pokémon’s head.

name: skeledirge
info: The fiery bird changes shape when Skeledirge sings. Rumor has it that the bird was born when the fireball on Skeledirge’s head gained a soul.

name: quaxly
info: This Pokémon migrated to Paldea from distant lands long ago. The gel secreted by its feathers repels water and grime.""

name: quaxwell
info: These Pokémon constantly run through shallow waters to train their legs, then compete with each other to see which of them kicks most gracefully.

name: quaquaval
info: A single kick from a Quaquaval can send a truck rolling. This Pokémon uses its powerful legs to perform striking dances from far-off lands.

name: lechonk
info: It searches for food all day. It possesses a keen sense of smell but doesn’t use it for anything other than foraging.

name: oinkologne
info: Oinkologne is proud of its fine, glossy skin. It emits a concentrated scent from the tip of its tail.

name: tarountula
info: The ball of threads wrapped around its body is elastic enough to deflect the scythes of Scyther, this Pokémon’s natural enemy.

name: spidops
info: It clings to branches and ceilings using its threads and moves without a sound. It takes out its prey before the prey even notices it.

name: nymble
info: It has its third set of legs folded up. When it’s in a tough spot, this Pokémon jumps over 30 feet using the strength of its legs.

name: lokix
info: When it decides to fight all out, it stands on its previously folded legs to enter Showdown Mode. It neutralizes its enemies in short order.

name: pawmi
info: It has underdeveloped electric sacs on its cheeks. These sacs can produce electricity only if Pawmi rubs them furiously with the pads on its forepaws.

name: pawmo
info: When its group is attacked, Pawmo is the first to leap into battle, defeating enemies with a fighting technique that utilizes electric shocks.

name: pawmot
info: This Pokémon normally is slow to react, but once it enters battle, it will strike down its enemies with lightning-fast movements.

name: tandemaus
info: Exhibiting great teamwork, they use their incisors to cut pieces out of any material that might be useful for a nest, then make off with them.

name: maushold
info: The two little ones just appeared one day. The group might be a family of related Pokémon, but nobody knows for sure.

name: fidough
info: This Pokémon is smooth and moist to the touch. Yeast in Fidough’s breath induces fermentation in the Pokémon’s vicinity.

name: dachsbun
info: The pleasant aroma that emanates from this Pokémon’s body helps wheat grow, so Dachsbun has been treasured by farming villages.

name: smoliv
info: It protects itself from enemies by emitting oil from the fruit on its head. This oil is bitter and astringent enough to make someone flinch.

name: dolliv
info: Dolliv shares its tasty, fresh-scented oil with others. This species has coexisted with humans since times long gone.

name: arboliva
info: This calm Pokémon is very compassionate. It will share its delicious, nutrient-rich oil with weakened Pokémon.

name: squawkabilly
info: These Pokémon prefer to live in cities. They form flocks based on the color of their feathers, and they fight over territory.

name: nacli
info: It was born in a layer of rock salt deep under the earth. This species was particularly treasured in the old days, as they would share precious salt.

name: naclstack
info: This Pokémon dry cures its prey by spraying salt over them. The curing process steals away the water in the prey’s body.

name: garganacl
info: Garganacl will rub its fingertips together and sprinkle injured Pokémon with salt. Even severe wounds will promptly heal afterward.

name: charcadet
info: Burnt charcoal came to life and became a Pokémon. Possessing a fiery fighting spirit, Charcadet will battle even tough opponents.

name: armarouge
info: Armarouge evolved through the use of a set of armor that belonged to a distinguished warrior. This Pokémon is incredibly loyal.

name: ceruledge
info: The fiery blades on its arms burn fiercely with the lingering resentment of a sword wielder who fell before accomplishing their goal.

name: tadbulb
info: Tadbulb shakes its tail to generate electricity. If it senses danger, it will make its head blink on and off to alert its allies.

name: bellibolt
info: When this Pokémon expands and contracts its wobbly body, the belly-button dynamo in its stomach produces a huge amount of electricity.

name: wattrel
info: When its wings catch the wind, the bones within produce electricity. This Pokémon dives into the ocean, catching prey by electrocuting them.

name: kilowattrel
info: Kilowattrel inflates its throat sac to amplify its electricity. By riding the wind, this Pokémon can fly over 430 miles in a day.

name: maschiff
info: It always scowls in an attempt to make opponents take it seriously, but even crying children will burst into laughter when they see Maschiff’s face.

name: mabosstiff
info: This Pokémon can store energy in its large dewlap. Mabosstiff unleashes this energy all at once to blow away enemies.

name: shroodle
info: Though usually a mellow Pokémon, it will sink its sharp, poison-soaked front teeth into any that anger it, causing paralysis in the object of its ire.

name: grafaiai
info: The color of the poisonous saliva depends on what the Pokémon eats. Grafaiai covers its fingers in its saliva and draws patterns on trees in forests.

name: bramblin
info: A soul unable to move on to the afterlife was blown around by the wind until it got tangled up with dried grass and became a Pokémon.

name: brambleghast
info: It will open the branches of its head to envelop its prey. Once it absorbs all the life energy it needs, it expels the prey and discards it.

name: toedscool
info: Toedscool lives in muggy forests. The flaps that fall from its body are chewy and very delicious.

name: toedscruel
info: These Pokémon gather into groups and form colonies deep within forests. They absolutely hate it when strangers approach.

name: klawf
info: Klawf hangs upside-down from cliffs, waiting for prey. But Klawf can’t remain in this position for long because its blood rushes to its head.

name: capsakid
info: The more sunlight this Pokémon bathes in, the more spicy chemicals are produced by its body, and thus the spicier its moves become.

name: scovillain
info: The red head converts spicy chemicals into fire energy and blasts the surrounding area with a super spicy stream of flame.

name: rellor
info: This Pokémon creates a mud ball by mixing sand and dirt with psychic energy. It treasures its mud ball more than its own life.

name: rabsca
info: The body that supports the ball barely moves. Therefore, it is thought that the true body of this Pokémon is actually inside the ball.

name: flittle
info: Flittle’s toes levitate about half an inch above the ground because of the psychic power emitted from the frills on the Pokémon’s belly.

name: espathra
info: It immobilizes opponents by bathing them in psychic power from its large eyes. Despite its appearance, it has a vicious temperament.

name: tinkatink
info: It swings its handmade hammer around to protect itself, but the hammer is often stolen by Pokémon that eat metal.

name: tinkatuff
info: This Pokémon will attack groups of Pawniard and Bisharp, gathering metal from them in order to create a large and sturdy hammer.

name: tinkaton
info: This intelligent Pokémon has a very daring disposition. It knocks rocks into the sky with its hammer, aiming for flying Corviknight.

name: wiglett
info: This Pokémon can pick up the scent of a Veluza just over 65 feet away and will hide itself in the sand.

name: wugtrio
info: It has a vicious temperament, contrary to what its appearance may suggest. It wraps its long bodies around prey, then drags the prey into its den.

name: bombirdier
info: It gathers things up in an apron made from shed feathers added to the Pokémon’s chest feathers, then drops those things from high places for fun.

name: finizen
info: It likes playing with others of its kind using the water ring on its tail. It uses ultrasonic waves to sense the emotions of other living creatures.

name: palafin
info: This Pokémon changes its appearance if it hears its allies calling for help. Palafin will never show anybody its moment of transformation.

name: varoom
info: It is said that this Pokémon was born when an unknown poison Pokémon entered and inspirited an engine left at a scrap-processing factory.

name: revavroom
info: It creates a gas out of poison and minerals from rocks. It then detonates the gas in its cylinders—now numbering eight—to generate energy.

name: cyclizar
info: Apparently Cyclizar has been allowing people to ride on its back since ancient times. Depictions of this have been found in 10,000-year-old murals.

name: orthworm
info: When attacked, this Pokémon will wield the tendrils on its body like fists and pelt the opponent with a storm of punches.

name: glimmet
info: It absorbs nutrients from cave walls. The petals it wears are made of crystallized poison.

name: glimmora
info: When this Pokémon detects danger, it will open up its crystalline petals and fire beams from its conical body.

name: greavard
info: It is said that a dog Pokémon that died in the wild without ever interacting with a human was reborn as this Pokémon.

name: houndstone
info: Houndstone spends most of its time sleeping in graveyards. Among all the dog Pokémon, this one is most loyal to its master.

name: flamigo
info: This Pokémon apparently ties the base of its neck into a knot so that energy stored in its belly does not escape from its beak.

name: cetoddle
info: This species left the ocean and began living on land a very long time ago. It seems to be closely related to Wailmer.

name: cetitan
info: This Pokémon wanders around snowy, icy areas. It protects its body with powerful muscles and a thick layer of fat under its skin.

name: veluza
info: When Veluza discards unnecessary flesh, its mind becomes honed and its psychic power increases. The spare flesh has a mild but delicious flavor.

name: dondozo
info: This Pokémon is a glutton, but it’s bad at getting food. It teams up with a Tatsugiri to catch prey.

name: tatsugiri
info: This is a small dragon Pokémon. It lives inside the mouth of Dondozo to protect itself from enemies on the outside.

name: annihilape
info: When its anger rose beyond a critical point, this Pokémon gained power that is unfettered by the limits of its physical body.

name: clodsire
info: When attacked, this Pokémon will retaliate by sticking thick spines out from its body. It’s a risky move that puts everything on the line.

name: farigiraf
info: Now that the brain waves from the head and tail are synced up, the psychic power of this Pokémon is 10 times stronger than Girafarig’s.

name: dudunsparce
info: This Pokémon uses its hard tail to make its nest by boring holes into bedrock deep underground. The nest can reach lengths of over six miles.

name: kingambit
info: Only a Bisharp that stands above all others in its vast army can evolve into Kingambit.

name: great-tusk
info: Sightings of this Pokémon have occurred in recent years. The name Great Tusk was taken from a creature listed in a certain book.

name: scream-tail
info: There has been only one reported sighting of this Pokémon. It resembles a mysterious creature depicted in an old expedition journal.

name: brute-bonnet
info: It is possible that the creature listed as Brute Bonnet in a certain book could actually be this Pokémon.

name: flutter-mane
info: This Pokémon has characteristics similar to those of Flutter Mane, a creature mentioned in a certain book.

name: slither-wing
info: This mysterious Pokémon has some similarities to a creature that an old book introduced as Slither Wing.

name: sandy-shocks
info: No records exist of this Pokémon being caught. Data is lacking, but the Pokémon’s traits match up with a creature shown in an expedition journal.

name: iron-treads
info: This Pokémon closely resembles a scientific weapon that a paranormal magazine claimed was sent to this planet by aliens.

name: iron-bundle
info: Its shape is similar to a robot featured in a paranormal magazine article. The robot was said to have been created by an ancient civilization.

name: iron-hands
info: It is very similar to a cyborg covered exclusively by a paranormal magazine. The cyborg was said to be the modified form of a certain athlete.

name: iron-jugulis
info: It resembles a certain Pokémon introduced in a paranormal magazine, described as the offspring of a Hydreigon that fell in love with a robot.

name: iron-moth
info: This Pokémon resembles an unknown object described in a paranormal magazine as a UFO sent to observe humanity.

name: iron-thorns
info: It has some similarities to a Pokémon introduced in a dubious magazine as a Tyranitar from one billion years into the future.

name: frigibax
info: Frigibax absorbs heat through its dorsal fin and converts the heat into ice energy. The higher the temperature, the more energy Frigibax stores.

name: arctibax
info: Arctibax freezes the air around it, protecting its face with an ice mask and turning its dorsal fin into a blade of ice.

name: baxcalibur
info: This Pokémon blasts cryogenic air out from its mouth. This air can instantly freeze even liquid-hot lava.

name: gimmighoul
info: This Pokémon was born inside a treasure chest about 1,500 years ago. It sucks the life-force out of scoundrels who try to steal the treasure.

name: gholdengo
info: Its body seems to be made up of 1,000 coins. This Pokémon gets along well with others and is quick to make friends with anybody.

name: wo-chien
info: The grudge of a person punished for writing the king’s evil deeds upon wooden tablets has clad itself in dead leaves to become a Pokémon.

name: chien-pao
info: This Pokémon can control 100 tons of fallen snow. It plays around innocently by leaping in and out of avalanches it has caused.

name: ting-lu
info: The fear poured into an ancient ritual vessel has clad itself in rocks and dirt to become a Pokémon.

name: chi-yu
info: It controls flames burning at over 5,400 degrees Fahrenheit. It casually swims through the sea of lava it creates by melting rock and sand.

name: roaring-moon
info: It is possible that this is the creature listed as Roaring Moon in an expedition journal that still holds many mysteries.

name: iron-valiant
info: It has some similarities to a mad scientist’s invention covered in a paranormal magazine.

name: koraidon
info: This seems to be the Winged King mentioned in an old expedition journal. It was said to have split the land with its bare fists.

name: miraidon
info: Much remains unknown about this creature. It resembles Cyclizar, but it is far more ruthless and powerful.

name: walking-wake
info: This ferocious creature is shrouded in mystery. It's named after an aquatic monster mentioned in an old expedition journal.

name: iron-leaves
info: Many of its physical characteristics match those of a Virizion from the future that was covered in a paranormal magazine.

name: dipplin
info: Dipplin is two creatures in one Pokémon. Its evolution was triggered by a special apple grown only in one place.

name: poltchageist
info: Supposedly, the regrets of a tea ceremony master who died before perfecting his craft lingered in some matcha and became a Pokémon.

name: sinistcha
info: It pretends to be tea, trying to fool people into drinking it so it can drain their life-force. Its ruse is generally unsuccessful.

name: okidogi
info: After all its muscles were stimulated by the toxic chain around its neck, Okidogi transformed and gained a powerful physique.

name: munkidori
info: The chain is made from toxins that enhance capabilities. It stimulated Munkidori's brain and caused the Pokémon's psychic powers to bloom.

name: fezandipiti
info: Fezandipiti owes its beautiful looks and lovely voice to the toxic stimulants emanating from the chain wrapped around its body.

name: ogerpon
info: This Pokémon's type changes based on which mask it's wearing. It confounds its enemies with nimble movements and kicks.

name: archaludon
info: It gathers static electricity from its surroundings. The beams it launches when down on all fours are tremendously powerful.

name: hydrapple
info: Seven syrpents live inside an apple made of syrup. The syrpent in the center is the commander.

name: gouging-fire
info: There are scant few reports of this creature being sighted. One short video shows it rampaging and spouting pillars of flame.

name: raging-bolt
info: It's said to incinerate everything around it with lightning launched from its fur. Very little is known about this creature.

name: iron-boulder
info: It resembles a Pokémon described in a dubious magazine as a Terrakion that had been modified by an evil organization.

name: iron-crown
info: It resembles a mysterious object introduced in a paranormal magazine as a cutting-edge weapon shaped like a Cobalion.

name: terapagos
info: Terapagos protects itself using its power to transform energy into hard crystals. This Pokémon is the source of the Terastal phenomenon.

name: pecharunt
info: It feeds others toxic mochi that draw out desires and capabilities. Those who eat the mochi fall under Pecharunt’s control, chained to its will.
